short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fast search and random number prediction
short.vi: Tìm kiếm nhanh và dự đoán số ngẫu nhiên

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Aubtu is a Chrome Extension developed by aubtu.biz, a website specializing in diverse news and information about entertainment, life, humor, comics and horoscopes. This extension provides two main functions:

Search for diverse information: Users can enter search keywords into the search box in the extension. When they press the "Search" button, the extension will open a new tab containing search results on aubtu.biz based on the keyword they entered.

Fun game: In addition to the search function, Aubtu offers a fun game. The user can enter a number from 0 to 2 into the game box. When they press the "Search & Play Game" button, the extension will automatically generate a random number and compare it with the number the user entered. If the two numbers match, the user will receive the message "Cool, you're awesome!". Otherwise, they'll get the message "Better luck next time!".

Aubtu Extension provides a diverse experience, combining multi-field information search functions and an interesting mini game, creating an attractive and convenient entertainment application for Chrome users.

How to use the Aubtu Chrome Extension application:

Click the Aubtu icon on the Chrome toolbar.
Enter the keyword you want to search in the "Search" box and press the "Search" button.
A new tab will open and display search results from aubtu.biz based on the keyword you entered.
Play fun games:

On the extension's interface, enter a number from 0 to 2 in the "Play Game" box.
Click the "Search & Play Game" button.
The extension will automatically compare the number you entered with a random number. If they match, you'll get the message "Cool, you're awesome!". Otherwise, you'll get the message "Better luck next time!" along with the generated random number.
Aubtu Chrome Extension provides a simple experience, combining the information search function on aubtu.biz and an interesting mini game, creating a convenient and entertaining application on the Chrome browser.

Contact for application comments at:
Address: 839 Heatley Ave, Vancouver, BC V6A 3H2, Canada
